data.name: AddMissing
data.value: Add missing

data.name: ArchiveBreakoutPath
data.value: This path points outside of the archive.

data.name: AskForPassphrase
data.value: Please enter the GnuPG passphrase for {0}:

data.name: AskInstallerEXE
data.value: Is this an installer EXE?

data.name: AskSkipCapture
data.value: Are you sure you want to skip capturing? Information about the application's desktop integration (e.g. file associations) will not be added to the feed.

data.name: AskSkipIcon
data.value: Are you sure you want to continue without adding icons? Zero Install will only be able to display a generic placeholder icon in the catalog as well as for any desktop integration shortcuts.

data.name: AskSkipSecurity
data.value: Are you sure you want to continue without completing these settings? Your feed will only work locally and not online.

data.name: DetectingCandidates
data.value: Searching for executable files

data.name: DigestKeep
data.value: Keep The implementation was supposed to stay the same

data.name: DigestMismatch
data.value: The manifest digest has changed. Do you wish to replace the existing one?

data.name: DigestOtherImplementations
data.value: All other retrieval methods for this implementation must match the new digest as well!

data.name: DigestReplace
data.value: Replace I changed the implementation on purpose

data.name: DiscardChanges
data.value: Discard Discard unsaved changes

data.name: DownloadingPeviewImage
data.value: Downloading image for preview...

data.name: EmptyImplementation
data.value: A manifest digest was calculated for an empty directory. Check that you have set the correct "extract" value for the archive.

data.name: EntryPointNotFound
data.value: The application's entry point was not found. Try specifying it manually.

data.name: FeedNotValid
data.value: The feed does not have the correct format.

data.name: FileDialogFilter
data.value: Feed files (*.xml)|*.xml|Template files (*.xml.template)|*.xml.template|All files|*

data.name: FileNotFound
data.value: The file '{0}' could not be found.

data.name: HintTextMultiline
data.value: A complete possibly multi-line description

data.name: HrefMissing
data.value: The download URL is missing.

data.name: ImageFormatNotSupported
data.value: The image format is not supported by Zero Install.

data.name: InstallationDirDetected
data.value: Detected '{0}' as installation directory.

data.name: InstallerExtractFailed
data.value: Failed to extract the installer as an archive.

data.name: InstallerNeedAltSource
data.value: You need to provide an alternative download source for the application, e.g. a ZIP archive. We will still use the desktop integration information captured from the installer!

data.name: InvalidCapabilitiesRegistryPath
data.value: Invalid capabilities registry path: {0}

data.name: LicenseInfo
data.value: This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law. You may redistribute copies of this program under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License.

data.name: ManifestDigestChanged
data.value: Manifest digest may have changed.

data.name: ManifestDigestMissing
data.value: Manifest digest not calculated yet.

data.name: MissingArguments
data.value: Missing arguments. Try {0} --help

data.name: MissingProgramFiles32Bit
data.value: No 32-bit %ProgramFiles% directory found.

data.name: MultipleDefaultProgramsDetected
data.value: Multiple new default programs were detected in the registry. Handling them all, but the last one may take precedence in some cases.

data.name: MultipleInstallationDirsDetected
data.value: Multiple installation directories were detected. Choosing first by default.

data.name: MultipleRegisteredAppsDetected
data.value: Multiple new application registrations were detected in the registry. Choosing first by default.

data.name: NewKey
data.value: New key...

data.name: NoEntryPointsFound
data.value: No entry points (EXEs, JARs, Python scripts, etc.) were found. Please make sure you selected the correct archive and extract directory.

data.name: NoFeedFilesFound
data.value: Unable to find any matching feed files.

data.name: NoInstallationDirDetected
data.value: No installation directory was detected. Try specifying it manually.

data.name: NoSingleExecutable
data.value: No, the application itself consists only of one EXE

data.name: OnlyAvailableOnWindows
data.value: This method is currently only available on Windows.

data.value: Download missing archives, calculate manifest digests, etc..

data.value: Combine all specified feeds into a single catalog {FILE}.

data.name: OptionGnuPGPassphrase
data.value: Use {PASS} to unlock the GnuPG secret key.

data.name: OptionHelp
data.value: Show the built-in help text.

data.name: OptionKey
data.value: Key to use for signing (if you have more than one, or if you want to resign with a different key).

data.name: OptionUnsign
data.value: Remove any existing signatures.

data.name: OptionVersion

data.name: OptionXmlSign
data.value: Add an XML signature block. (All remote feeds must be signed.)
